pages.text: $(li)The Pumpkin Fields is a biome where you can harvest a lot of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin)Pumpkins$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find common Pumpkins, Large Pumpkings, Maple Trees, Red and Brown Mushrooms.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird)Hummingbirds$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/raccoon)Raccoons$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)On the night you can find a funny $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombie$(/l) wearing a Pumpkin on the head.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Pumpkin Fields$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
